            <div class="DNNModuleContent ModNuntioContentC" id="dnn_ctr498_ModuleContent">
             <div class="homecontent">
              <h6 style="text-align: justify;">
               Life is unpredictable, and therefore keeping your family members, home, property and business financially protected is very important.
               <strong>
                Smith-Reagan Insurance Agency
               </strong>
               is a local independent firm providing affordable and comprehensive insurance plans to all our clients in San Benito, McAllen and surrounding locations. We work with a number of leading insurance companies in the nation to ensure that you are able to compare coverages and choose the most suitable insurance plans for your family and business.
              </h6>
              <h6>
              </h6>
              <h6>
               At
               <strong>
                Smith-Reagan Insurance Agency
               </strong>
               , we understand how stressful it is to choose from the variety of complex insurance policies available in San Benito and McAllen, Texas. Our professional representatives aim at providing you peace of mind by providing you with knowledge and understanding about the many insurance options. We work hard so you don’t have to go through lengthy paperwork or keep paying excessive monthly amounts to insurance companies. We also make sure that you and your loved ones are provided with complete financial protection and security.
              </h6>
              <h3>
               Insurance Services
              </h3>
              <ul>
               <li>
                <strong>
                 Personal Insurance:
                </strong>
                It includes coverage for Standard and Non Standard Auto, Motorcycle, ATV’s, Golf Cart, RV’s, Watercraft, and Classic Auto.
               </li>
               <li>
                <strong>
                 Business Insurance:
                </strong>
                It includes Commercial Property, General and Professional Liability, Commercial Auto, Farm and Ranch, Inland Marine, Kidnap and Ransom, Contractors, Business Package, Bonds, Equipment, Flood, Medical Malpractice and Commercial Umbrella.
               </li>
               <li>
                <strong>
                 Life/Health Insurance:
                </strong>
                We provide coverage for whole life, universal life, term life, Individual and Group Health, Disability, Long Term Care and Annuities.
               </li>
              </ul>
              <h3>
               Why Choose Us?
              </h3>
              <ul>
               <li>
                Comprehensive insurance plans to help you stay protected from the unexpected.
               </li>
               <li>
                Customized coverage plans to meet your specific needs and budget.
               </li>
               <li>
                Extensive experience to help you make well-informed decisions regarding your insurance needs.
               </li>
               <li>
                Association with numerous carriers helps us provide you a thorough comparison of coverage plans.
               </li>
              </ul>
              <h6 style="text-align: justify;">
               Working with
               <strong>
                Smith-Reagan Insurance Agency
               </strong>
               , you can find the perfect insurance plan for your family, home, business and vehicles in San Benito and McAllen, TX. Check out our online quoting process or call one of our insurance agents today at (956) 399-1353 for more details.
              </h6>
              <h3>
               Our Office Location:
              </h3>
              <p>
               148 North Sam Houston Boulevard
              </p>
              <p>
               San Benito, Texas 78586.
              </p>
             </div>
